dict.acceptation: 佃户租种的土地；所有物（如土地、债券、股份等）；私有财产；（因其热情、精力或决心等）阻拦不住某人；
拿( hold的现在分词)；认为；包含；容纳；

sent.orig: It'shocks the current trend holding up, holding the main recommendations.
sent.trans: 目前该股震荡攀升趋势未改，建议持股为主。

sent.orig: State property holding companies than private property holding companies release more cash dividends.
sent.trans: 国有产权控股比私有产权控股派现更多。

sent.orig: I was holding a large crowbar, and my co-worker was holding a sledgehammer.
sent.trans: 我拿着一根很大的撬棍，我的同事拿着一把大锤。

sent.orig: They were holding hands, ie holding each other's hands.
One general is holding a iron staff, the other is holding up a long spear.
sent.trans: 这两位将军，一个手持钢鞭，一个举着长矛。
